headline: Cognizant Technology Solutions (NasdaqGS:CTSH) Launches AI-Driven Contact Center With Google Cloud
summary: Cognizant Technology Solutions (NasdaqGS:CTSH) recently partnered with Google Cloud to release the Cognizant速 Autonomous Customer Engagement solution, an AI-driven platform aimed at transforming customer interactions. Although the company's stock price saw minimal change over the last quarter, several key events could have influenced its stability. These include Cognizant's open-sourcing of its Neuro AI Multi-Agent Accelerator and expanded collaboration with Pegasystems, potentially...

headline: Smarter Support, Quicker Fixes: Cognizant Partners with Google Cloud to Rethink Customer Service with AI
summary: Cognizant (NASDAQ: CTSH), in partnership with Google Cloud, has launched Cognizant速 Autonomous Customer Engagement, a new AI-led autonomous contact center solution, built to deliver hyper-personalized customer experiences across every stage of the order journey, across industries. content.title: Smarter Support, Quicker Fixes: Cognizant Partners with Google Cloud to Rethink Customer Service with AI
content.summary: Cognizant (NASDAQ: CTSH), in partnership with Google Cloud, has launched Cognizant速 Autonomous Customer Engagement, a new AI-led autonomous contact center solution, built to deliver hyper-personalized customer experiences across every stage of the order journey, across industries. This solution fuses Cognizant's deep expertise in industry-specific processes and contact center operations with the advanced intelligence of Google Cloud's Customer Engagement Suite, to deliver interactions that are c

thumbnail.caption: By pairing generative AI with human support in contact center operations, Cognizant and Google Cloud aim to improve customer satisfaction, accelerate support, and drive smarter interactions across digital and voice channels for consumers and enterprise clients.
